short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drive a police car in this very mass simulator! Explore the city the way you like it best and turn on nitro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose a variety of powerful vehicles like police cars and show your driver skills to the test.
To achieve the highest scores in the game you must perform various dangerous stunts and drifting. Good luck!
